about_the_game:
Do you like adventure? Do you like cats? Do you like SLG-SimulationGame?

《CAPTURE CATCOFFEE 》 is a development management game with a cat cafe theme and a pinball machine gameplay. Players will play the role of cat cafe operators and travel through the mysterious staff room door to a world where cats rule the world. The cat kingdom is full of adventures. Along the way, you can meet all kinds of cats, defeat them and hire them as your own cat employees!!

Catch your own cat!!

Travel to the Cat Kingdom where cats rule the world. Explore a huge open map, fight off hordes of enemies, and defeat the cats in the Cat Kingdom to make them voluntarily sign Slave labor contract.

You can bring up to 5 cats to protect yourself when you explore. Each cat has different functions due to different personalities, and the level of intimacy will affect the performance in battle. But please note that if the cat's intimacy is too low, it will have It may escape in the middle of a fight, and you need to accurately command the cat and make good use of rolling to avoid getting hurt.

In addition, you can also use a variety of portable props to assist the cat in fighting. If you are injured, don’t worry too much, you can take out the food carried in the backpack to recover. Different food will also bring different effects.

Raising cats, petting cats, playing with cats

Cats will increase or decrease their intimacy with you based on how you treat them. If the intimacy is high, cats will perform better in all aspects and can bring you more help.

Each cat has a unique personality. You need to make good use of their characteristics to effectively help you. Remember to give the cat cans and pet them. When the favorability is too low, it can cause damage to your cat cafe. Will also run away from home.

You know, cats are not easy to mess with!!

Pinball Cafe

Are you ready to welcome hordes of guests? They are like falling marbles and they are rushing into your cafe to spend money. Let your cat accept the touch of the cat slave and serve delicious food from the cat world. them!

Rich world

In this world of cats, there are actually many different races living here. Let’s dig into the stories of the kingdom buried under the cute cats!!

Do you like adventure? Do you like cats? Do you like SLG-SimulationGame?

《CAPTURE CATCOFFEE 》 is a development management game with a cat cafe theme and a pinball machine gameplay. Players will play the role of cat cafe operators and travel through the mysterious staff room door to a world where cats rule the world. The cat kingdom is full of adventures. Along the way, you can meet all kinds of cats, defeat them and hire them as your own cat employees!!

Catch your own cat!!

Travel to the Cat Kingdom where cats rule the world. Explore a huge open map, fight off hordes of enemies, and defeat the cats in the Cat Kingdom to make them voluntarily sign Slave labor contract.

You can bring up to 5 cats to protect yourself when you explore. Each cat has different functions due to different personalities, and the level of intimacy will affect the performance in battle. But please note that if the cat's intimacy is too low, it will have It may escape in the middle of a fight, and you need to accurately command the cat and make good use of rolling to avoid getting hurt.

In addition, you can also use a variety of portable props to assist the cat in fighting. If you are injured, don’t worry too much, you can take out the food carried in the backpack to recover. Different food will also bring different effects.

Raising cats, petting cats, playing with cats

Cats will increase or decrease their intimacy with you based on how you treat them. If the intimacy is high, cats will perform better in all aspects and can bring you more help.

Each cat has a unique personality. You need to make good use of their characteristics to effectively help you. Remember to give the cat cans and pet them. When the favorability is too low, it can cause damage to your cat cafe. Will also run away from home.

You know, cats are not easy to mess with!!

Pinball Cafe

Are you ready to welcome hordes of guests? They are like falling marbles and they are rushing into your cafe to spend money. Let your cat accept the touch of the cat slave and serve delicious food from the cat world. them!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Capture Catcoffee

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You will play the role of a cat cafe operator and go through the mysterious door to adventure in the cat kingdom. You can meet various cats, defeat them and hire them as your own cat employees! Bring your own cat, build your own cat cafe, and enjoy delicious food from another world!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
